Posts.Content: Dec 29, 2010 01:08PM MawMawRita wrote: I just found this forum today and joined.  I was diagnosed with DCIS, stage 0, grade 3 on 10/20/10.  Because of my family history I opted for the bilateral mastecomy with immediate reconstruction.  I had the surgery on 12/6/10.  I took my PS recommendation of skin sparing and expanders.  I am recovering very nicely.  I'll have my first saline injection into the expanders 1/3/11 and plan to go back to work 1/6/11 (fingers crossed).
Posts.Title: December 2010 Mastectomy zogo fire-dancer
